numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that younger people have more optimism than older people.
2. I wonder if this is because of real-world experience and knowledge.
3. This relates to me and my community.
4. Some adults in my community think that the younger generation is disruptive.
5. Some adults in my community think that the younger generation is uneducated.
6. Some adults in my community think that the younger generation is ignorant.
7. Many younger people think that they do great hacking.
8. The graph shows people who are aged 15-24.
9. The graph shows people who are over 40 years old.
10. The graph shows how these people answered a question.
11. The question is whether the world is getting better or worse with each generation.
